summary: A story about the Latvian basketball team, which won the first-ever European Championships in 1935 and its enthusiastic head coach Valdemars Baumanis.
cast: Janis Amanis|Inga Alsina|Vilis Daudzins|Marcis Manjakovs|Dainis Grube|Gints Andzans|Normunds Berzs|Andris Bulis|Viktors Ellers|Daniel Francis-Berenson|Peteris Gaudins|Maris Grigalis|Billy Jeffries|Girts Kesteris|Arturs Kruzkops|Joe Lewis|Martins Liepa|Benjamin Nathan-Serio|Uldis Norenbergs|Martins Pocs|Ilze Pukinska|Arturs Putnins|Intars Resetins|Mark Schardan|Imants Strads|Janis Vimba|Mikelis Zideluns
keywords: european championship|basketball tournament|based on real events
title: Sapnu komanda 1935
